currentCourses.title: Mixed Signal Integrated Circuits Design 2021
currentCourses.desc: This course covers Sampling Circuits, Basic building blocks - Opamps and Comparators, DAC ADC Specifications, DAC Architectures, ADC Architectures

currentCourses.title: Analog Microelectronic Circuits
currentCourses.desc: This course covers electronic devices MOSFET and BJT, its dc and ac analysis, small signal models, amplifier configurations, current mirrors, operational amplifiers and feedback and power amplifiers

Even 2020.title: Analog Integrated Circuits Design
Even 2020.desc: This course covers MOSFET based amplifiers, circuit level design of opamps, stability and frequency compensation of opamps, bandgap references,noise in ICs and analog filters

Even 2020.title: Radio Frequency and Millimeter Wave IC Design
Even 2020.desc: This course covers the nonlinearity and noise in integrated circuits, RF transceiver architectures - design and analysis, RF Circuit blocks like LNA, Mixer, Oscillators and PLL
